bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu lao 虛勞 , depletion exhaustion. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 13: 廣濟療瘦 病，每日西即赤色，脚手酸疼，口乾壯熱，獺肝丸方 , “The Kai yuan guang ji fang Recipe book. Tang era, 723. 開元廣濟方 [has] the recipe for pills with otter liver to cure emaciation disease . Each time when the sun is in the West [the patient] has a red color, the legs and hands are in sour pain. The mouth is dry and very hot”.
